channel.title: Hexo on Jacob个人技术博客
channel.description: Recent content in Hexo on Jacob个人技术博客

item.title: Hexo同步
item.description: 环境搭建 安装Node.js 用来生成静态页面, 到Node.js官网，下载最新版本, 根据提示一路安装即可 安装Git sudo apt-get install git 安装Hexo 当Node.js和Git都安装好后就可以正式安装Hexo了，终端执行如下命令： sudo npm install -g hexo 克隆hexo分支 git clone -b hexo https://github.com/Breakering/breakering.github.io.git 进入breakering.githu

item.title: Hexo初识
item.description: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post 1 $ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server 1 $ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files 1 $ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites 1 $ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
